response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Considering its intrinsic value and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this proposal carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know.
